replies.msg:
學生字最好搵埋相關例句去理解佢地適用既語境。


Intervene Interfere Interrupt 三字都由inter 開頭，都有「從中」既意思

Intervene 通常為正面詞，主要用係將壞事情導回正軌，例如 Mr Rickman intervened a bullying incident / X high school runs an intervention program to help students with low performance / Divine intervention - an act of God to save human from harm in mysterious ways.

Interfere 通常有負面感覺，最明顯例子係某大國經常介入他國內政，此乃interference.
例如 There are rumours about Russia interfering with US presidential elections

Interrupt 通常為負面詞，意思就係打斷咁解。
例如 Johnny interrupted the lesson by asking for permission to toilet/ Jackie interrupted the concert after being piss drunk

釐清語境之後自然就會快入腦，同埋你會建立一種適當用字既sense
